Hude:
The desert brings it's own suprizes, so we should be set for this. I can offer you our special *Caravan medicine*. This potion will reduce the *Heat of Desert* effect. It lasts for 1 hour.
Do you want to become true friend of Caravan?
To earn *Premium Caravan Certificate* you should bring *56 Life Force* and *14 Contained Life Force*
